name: Flying Karlson
description:
Valmuen GameJam 2021

10 hour GameJam. Theme A to B

Fast fun game inspired by the Swedish "Karlson på taket"

Karlson is hunting "Godis" while tactically manoeuvring trough Swedish houses.

When going from A to B it is never the destination that is importan. Everything is about the trip, and Karlson sure is going to have a great trip flying around

Programmer:

Adrian

Artist:

Regine

Joachim
